Posts.Content: Sep 20, 2018 11:10AM - edited Sep 20, 2018 11:15AM by D_RN I also experienced crushing chest pain from five days on to when I stopped one month later. With my very high risk from diabetes to Family history so ended up hospitalized to rule out MI. None of the Doctors were familiar with the cardiac risks till I had to educate them. Later the cardiologist came back said he researched it and without his team in tow apologized. I get a echo tomorrow. Now back to just MRI vs Mammography every six months. I have LCIS XX almost two years ago. Took a long time to even try the medication knowing my long allergy list . I Keep getting encouraged to do a bilaterally mastectomy by everybody...oh just do it and then don’t worry ..unforetunely I am Allergenic to dye and silicone etc so So this is a non option ...no thank you. Alone very alone
Posts.Title: Femara and Chest Pain JustStamping D_RN
